title: Painted Jezebel
description: Publicist Finn Mackenzie has always been lucky, until an ill-fated affair with a vindictive writer leaves him one chance for a spectacular public appearance by the elusive best-selling romance author, Jezebel Jinx.Unfortunately, the cute but kooky writer refuses to cooperate. Jezebel believes she’s cursed with bad luck. Riddled with anxieties, she never leaves her home— until the gorgeous, albeit desperate Finn whisks her away to a writer’s conference, against her will.After the initial shock wears off, Jezebel’s dormant hormones kick into high gear around the hunky Finn.When his ex turns up murdered and Jezebel is the prime suspect, ill-planned sexcapades are the least of their worries.
author: Jolie Pethtel
